item.description:
## What's Changed * Do not report broken symlinks when searching for applications by @ospfranco in https://github.com/ospfranco/sol/pull/239 * Fix passwords prefpane being gone in latest macOS by @ospfranco in https://github.com/ospfranco/sol/pull/240 * Fix calendar not focusing on event and erroring by @ospfranco in https://github.com/ospfranco/sol/pull/241
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ospfranco/sol/compare/2.1.294...2.1.295

## What's Changed * Match Applications by their localizedName by @DwieDave in https://github.com/ospfranco/sol/pull/237
## New Contributors * @DwieDave made their first contribution in https://github.com/ospfranco/sol/pull/237
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ospfranco/sol/compare/2.1.293...2.1.294

## What's Changed * Fixes various clipboard issues by @ospfranco in https://github.com/ospfranco/sol/pull/236
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ospfranco/sol/compare/2.1.292...2.1.293
